item.title: How to secure S3 bucket with username and password
item.description: When you start looking for a solution, you will find answers like using Cloudfront, lambda, and middleware 3rd party services. And basically, you don’t have any other choice. There is no simple solution to your problem. But – as long as you use Caddy Server solution is super easy.
